name: seamonkey-for-ppc
short_description:
Being a Motorola ( R.I.P. ) / IBM kinda guy, when Mozilla decided to stop supporting PPC I just had to pick the ball up and run with it.

SeaMonkey for PPC ( a derivative version of Mozilla's SeaMonkey ) is capable of running on G4/G5 based Macs using Mac OS 10.5.x which was the last release of OS X to support the PowerPC family of CPUs..

---------

seamonkey-for-ppc - 2.26 RELEASE - Mac OS X 10.5.x - PPC

ADDITIONAL FUNCTIONALITY: 

QuickDraw/Carbon Plugin capability has been restored.



Take the usual precautions !  

- Backup your profile.

- Be responsible about where you browse

and as an added precaution 

- Set your plug-ins to "Ask to Activate"


Enjoy

Thanks for your Support and help spread the word.

Get that G4/G5 out of the closet and back to where it belongs - ONLINE
summary: SeaMonkey for PPC  -  Breathing new life into your G4 / G5 Macs
